Name: Kanji Training Game
About the game: Ever wanted learn kanji, but can’t seem to stop playing games long enough to learn? Then play Kanji Training Game. Learn Kanji and the accompanying components, Katakana and Hiragana. Have fun and memorize a kanjis with Kanji Training Game. Kanji Training Game is a game that helps you memorize a symbols of Japanese writing system in the form of a game. Memorize 1006 symbols of Kanji, Katakana and Hiragana, and level up as you advance through the increasingly complex alphabet and words of the Japanese language. Have fun and learn a beautiful writing system with Kanji Training Game. Features: - Full Kyōiku kanji list of 1.006 symbols - Hiragana and Katakana game mode. - Steam trading cards. - Kanji Adventure mode
